title: PLS Article Directory
author: Lindsey McCullough
description: A full list of published PLS articles.
cleaned_text: Increasing awareness, quality, and discoverability. Discover all of our published [Plain Language Summaries (PLS)](https://authorservices.taylorandfrancis.com/publishing-your-research/writing-your-paper/how-to-write-a-plain-language-summary/) below from a variety of our Medical journals. Current Medical Research & Opinion A MEDLINE-indexed, international journal that publishes research focused on new and existing drugs and therapies, best practices in patient care, developments in diagnostic medicine and medical technology, and innovations in medical and scientific publishing. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/ICMO) Expert Review of Anticancer Therapy Publishes the latest research in cancer care including; diagnosis, biomarkers, tumor management, current and novel therapies, chemotherapy and immunotherapy. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERY) Expert Review of Anti-infective Therapy A MEDLINE-indexed journal delivering the latest research, publishing a variety of articles on all aspects involved in the treatment and management of infectious disease. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERZ) Expert Review of Clinical Immunology A MEDLINE-indexed, peer-reviewed journal providing the latest research on the performance of new therapeutic and diagnostic modalities in clinical immunology. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERM) Expert Review of Endocrinology & Metabolism Publishes research on endocrine control and metabolism, its clinical advancements, screening, diagnostics, therapeutics, molecular genetics and epidemiology. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERE) Expert Review of Neurotherapeutics A MEDLINE-indexed journal providing expert commentary on the use of drugs and medicines in clinical neurology and neuropsychiatry. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERN) Expert Review of Pharmacoeconomics & Outcomes Research Publishes double-blinded articles on cost-benefit and pharmacoeconomic issues in clinical drug use, therapeutic approaches, and evidence-based medicine. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERP) Expert Review of Respiratory Medicine Primary focus on obstructive/restrictive/vascular/infectious respiratory diseases like asthma, COPD, cystic fibrosis and sleep-disordered breathing morbidity. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERX) Expert Review of Vaccines A MEDLINE-indexed peer-reviewed journal providing expert commentary on the development, application, and clinical effectiveness of new vaccines. Topics include vaccine technology, vaccine adjuvants, prophylactic vaccines, and therapeutic vaccines. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERV) Human Vaccines & Immunotherapeutics An international journal of vaccinology and immunotherapy that publishes all aspects of work in these fields. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/KHVI) Journal of Medical Economics Serving the international pharmacoeconomics and healthcare-research community, it publishes economic assessments of novel therapeutic and device interventions, along-side studies that measure therapeutic or preventative outcomes, and policy issues. [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IJME) Postgraduate Medicine A peer-reviewed medical journal established by Charles Mayo MD, founder of the Mayo Clinic. The journal publishes research which supports primary care physicians in solving clinical problems and improving patient care. Postgraduate Medicine offers [accelerated publication.](https://taylorandfrancis.com/partnership/commercial/accelerated-publication/.) [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IPGM) Expert Opinion on Drug Safety A MEDLINE-indexed journal publishing reviews on all aspects of drug safety, adverse events, and pharmacovigilance, as well as original research on the clinical implications of drug treatment safety issues. [This journal offers accelerated publication.](https://taylorandfrancis.com/partnership/commercial/accelerated-publication/) [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IEDS) Expert Review of Clinical Pharmacology Medline-indexed clinical pharmacology research on drug evaluation, safety, toxicity, tolerability, efficacy, genomics, adverse reactions and pharmacoeconomics. [This journal offers accelerated publication.](https://taylorandfrancis.com/partnership/commercial/accelerated-publication/) [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERJ) Expert Review of Hematology Publishes on vascular medicine & hematology, their diseases & therapeutic techniques including immunotherapy, stem cell transplantation & transfusion medicine. [It offers accelerated publication.](https://taylorandfrancis.com/partnership/commercial/accelerated-publication/) [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERR) Expert Review of Medical Devices A MEDLINE-indexed journal serving the device research community by providing commentary, analysis and debate for all professionals involved in research, development, testing, and clinical use of devices. [It offers accelerated publication.](https://taylorandfrancis.com/partnership/commercial/accelerated-publication/.) [View journal](https://www.tandfonline.com/IERD) Expert Review of Molecular Diagnostics Medline-indexed expert evaluation of molecular diagnostics and detection of molecular causes of disease and new diagnostic and prognostic technologies.
